markdown.markdown:
<!-- ![Welcome, Fluid Flow](./assets/images/fluidflow.jpg) -->


This website has some cool stuff about me i.e. Roussel Desmond Nzoyem (RD2N). You'll also find interesting stories about various topics in **hard science**, **cognitive sciences**, and some even more random stuff.

To learn more about me, go to the [About](/about.qmd) page. In [Projects](/projects.qmd), you'll find some work I've contributed to, along with the tech stack I've mastered over the years. For some very random stuff, go to [Blog](/posts.qmd) where you'll find a curated list of stories, articles, and poems. I hope you'll enjoy !


## News

- _01 Aug. 2023_ : I've released version 0.1.5 of Updec: a differentiable mesh-free software for quick experimentation with a variety of PDEs. Find it here.
- _10 Mar. 2023_ : I gave a talk for CMU Africa on Emerging Graph Neural Network techniques. Find a recording here.
- _01 Dec. 2022_ : I begun my research topics on AI and HPC for mesh-free simulations. A short abstract can be foudn here.
- _10 Oct. 2021_ : I moved to Bristol for a PhD in the Interacrive AI CDT. Find pictures of my trips on Instagram.


## Newsletter
If you enjoy what you see and want to stay updated, then please subscribe to my newletter (it's non-spammy).
